summary: Experienced general manager in R&D and the delivery of Capital Projects in Oil and Gas. Strategic and thought leadership on innovation, project assurance, subsurface understanding, change management and project safety, all building upon a deep technical background. Led teams, projects and communities up to hundreds of people in different cultures with complex stakeholder management and in operated and joint-venture settings. Can-do attitude, focus on delivery and innovation, team player and motivator. Deep technical skills in petrophysics, subsurface modelling and field development. Building upon my PhD and the first 20 years of my career currently further deepening my skills in pattern recognition, image analysis and machine learning.
